thread.title: Trump Takes on Tech Industry in Early Policy Moves
thread.title_full: Trump Takes on Tech Industry in Early Policy Moves - WSJ

author: John D. McKinnon
title: Trump Takes on Tech Industry in Early Policy Moves
text:
In his first weeks in office, President Donald Trump has shown a readiness to take on the tech industry, clashing with Silicon Valley in ways that his tech-friendly predecessor hardly ever did.
The president’s executive order on immigration, which generated an outcry from the industry, was only the beginning.
Trump-appointed regulators have begun scaling back net-neutrality regulations that marked one of the tech industry’s...
